## ğŸš€ Installation

### Docker (Recommended)
```bash
# Pull the latest images
docker pull ghcr.io/likhonsexikh/sheikh-ai-frontend:latest
docker pull ghcr.io/likhonsexikh/sheikh-ai-backend:latest
docker pull ghcr.io/likhonsexikh/sheikh-ai-sandbox:latest

# Run with docker-compose
docker-compose up -d
```

### From Source
```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/likhonsexikh/sheikh-ai.git
cd sheikh-ai

# Follow the setup instructions in README.md
```
